Philly^| February 8, 2011| AP Posted on 02/08/2011 8:56:23 AM PST STONEWALLS DALLAS( AP)- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation.
